imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Recolor to a bright green and black Apple-bubble theme while retaining a glossy, floating-bubble look (site-background-neon-bubbles.dim_1920x1080.png > site-background-neon-bubbles-green-black.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Recolor to a matching bright green and black Apple-bubble theme for mobile/portrait (site-background-neon-bubbles-mobile.dim_1080x1920.png > site-background-neon-bubbles-mobile-green-black.dim_1080x1920.png)
- Recolor bubble overlay elements to match bright green and black theme while keeping transparency suitable for overlay usage (bubble-overlays-transparent.dim_1024x1024.png > bubble-overlays-transparent-green-black.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Update the site-wide background to keep the existing Apple-style bubble aesthetic but switch the palette to bright green and black, including both desktop and mobile/portrait backgrounds.
Update floating bubble decorative overlays to match the bright green and black Apple-bubble theme so the hero section background decor visually matches the new site-wide background.
Adjust the global background overlay/gradient (in global CSS) as needed so the bright green + black bubble background remains readable behind content while preserving the Apple-bubble aesthetic.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update background to match Apple bubble theme using bright green and black color palette

projectName: Update Apple bubble background to bright green and black theme
